name: Sans Grobot
description:
Controls: 

WASD- Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Dash

This game was made in 2 days for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam (I missed a day :\). This is a reupload with the HTML5 version and a few bugfixes. 

Take the role of the Sans Grobot as you slide around blasting baddies! Your Grobar on the top left of the screen indicates your progress toward the next level. Your power grows with level, and the bar increases the faster you go! You need this bar to shoot however! Use your levels to power up, or to obtain newer and more powerful guns! Careful, the stronger the gun, the stronger the kickback. Running into enemies while slipping and sliding around also damages them, as well as yourself! Last long enough and Bosses eventually spawn! How high can you get your level?
